2017-18 Men's Basketball Roster

Choose a Player:

Erik Schelkun

11 Matej Svoboda

Position F

Height 6-7

Weight 224

Class Freshman

Hometown Ostrava, Czech Republic

Highschool Sportovni Gymnazium Dany a Emila Zatopkovych Ostrava

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2017-2018 (Freshman)

• Played in 28 games and averaged 11.4 mpg.

• Averaged 2.2 points and 1.2 rebounds

• Shot a 32.9% (25-of-76) Field Goal Percentage and 20% (9-of-45) from behind the 3-point line.

• Named to 2017-18 A-10 Commissioner's Honor Roll

High School

• Attended high school at Sportovni Gymnazium Dany a Emila Zatopkovych, but basketball is not played at Czech high schools.

• Youth basketball player of the Czech Republic 2016.

• Played four seasons as an amateur on CEZ Basketball Nymburk professional team.

• CEZ Basketball Nymburk won Czech Republic Championship. 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017.

• Played for Czech Republic National Team U16-20 from 2011-2016 at European Championships.

• Also represented Czech Republic at the World Championships in 2012 (Team placed 8th).

• Was the second-leading scorer in the 2016 FIBA U-20 European Championships in Helsinki, Finland. He averaged 19.0 points a game in the seven-game tournament.

• The leading scorer was Lauri Markkanen, a 7-0 forward who starred for Arizona last year and is now in the NBA.

• Svoboda was the tournament's top three-point shooter, making 21 of 42 from behind the arc. Also averaged 7.3 rebounds and 1.9 assists at the 2016 championships.

Personal

• Full name: Matej Svoboda

• Son of: Radek and Jana Svoboda

• Birthdate: September 22, 1996

• Major: Communications

• Siblings: Stephan

• AAU Team: Cez Basketball Nymburk

• CEZ Nymburk Coach: Ronen Ginzburg

• Fun Fact: Last name translates as "Freedom" in English.
